comments.body: why don't the types.forAwait.* files have .js baselines? #Closed

Because they have `// @noEmit: true` at the top of the file. I am not checking emit with these tests, just type resolution. The .js output would be extraneous. There should be enough coverage in `emitter.forAwait.esnext.ts`, `emitter.forAwait.es2015.ts`, and `emitter.forAwait.es5.ts` for that.
